summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SecureShare secure file-sharing system. Backend APIs fully functional (18/18 tests passed). Frontend mostly working with 2 minor UI integration issues identified.

ui_bugs.issue: File sharing returns 404 error despite backend API working correctly
ui_bugs.details: Share dialog opens and accepts input, but API call fails with 404. Backend /api/files/share/{file_id} endpoint works in direct testing.

ui_bugs.issue: Delete button becomes unclickable due to modal overlay intercepting pointer events
ui_bugs.details: Share dialog modal doesn't close properly, leaving overlay that blocks file deletion button clicks.

passed_tests: Backend API - All 18 endpoints working (registration, login, OTP, file upload/download/delete, sharing, admin features, RBAC)
Frontend - User registration and login flow
Frontend - OTP verification with demo OTP display
Frontend - Dashboard navigation and file management UI
Frontend - Admin panel access and data display
Frontend - Role-based access control (admin tabs visibility)
Security - AES-256 encryption and RSA key exchange working
Security - SHA-256 file integrity verification working
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix 2 minor frontend UI issues: (1) File sharing 404 error - check frontend API call URL construction, (2) Modal overlay blocking delete button - ensure share dialog closes properly and removes overlay
